articles.title: Convertible High Chair Buying Guide 2025: Craftsmanship, Value, and Space-Savvy Picks
articles.author: Tayla White
articles.summary_html: This 2025 convertible high chair buying guide helps parents choose a long-lasting, space-saving model that adapts from newborn to school years. With detailed checklists on safety standards, craftsmanship, ergonomics, and cleaning, you’ll learn how to spot high-quality builds, compare materials like wood, metal, and plastics, and evaluate foldability for small spaces—ensuring a smart, stylish investment that grows with your child.

articles.title: When to Start Baby Led Weaning: Signs, Safety & First Foods Guide
articles.author: Tayla White
articles.summary_html: Baby-led weaning (BLW) in 2025 focuses on introducing solids around 6 months based on developmental readiness signs, not age alone. This evidence-based approach helps babies develop motor skills, independence, and healthy eating habits while reducing the risk of overfeeding. Our comprehensive guide covers BLW readiness checklists, choking vs. gagging differences, first food ideas, safety equipment like suction bowls, bibs, and training cups, plus expert insights from pediatric research. Discover how to create a safe, supportive environment for your baby's transition to solids and explore eco-friendly, parent-approved BLW essentials from Nestacular.

image.alt: Six-month-old baby sitting upright in high chair practicing baby-led weaning.
